name: 夏珮玲
objective: OBJECTIVES:  From the textbook and class activities, students will be able to improve English proficiency in comprehending reading materials, activate knowledge, increase reading fluency and cultivate topic-related vocabulary.

scorePolicy:
COURSE REQUIREMENTS AND POLIICIES: 
1.Tardiness: Don’t be late. You will lose points for being late. (遲到會扣分 2次遲到等於1次缺席) 
2.Absence: You will lose points for being absent. (出席很重要 缺席曠課會扣分) 
3.If you are absent for 5 times, you CANNOT pass this class. Show your teacher your Proof of Absence if you cannot come. (曠課五次或以上 扣考 / 請遵守學校請假程序)
4.無故缺考期中或期末考試者 該次考試成績以零分計算
5.Please turn off or MUTE your cell phone during class time. (上課請勿使用手機 請把收機收好)
6.Keep the classroom clean. (垃圾請帶走 保持教室乾淨)

EVALUATION:
     Attendance = 10%
     Participation = 20%
     Group Report = 10%  (4-6ppl / 10-15mins)
     Midterm paper (個人) = 10 %
     Quiz (midterm / final) = 20%
     School Midterm = 15%
     School Final Exam = 15%


Group report 重點說明: 
□	Topic-related short reading (文字不要太多 / 不要整段翻譯 / 英文閱讀很重要 / 清楚講解)
□	Vocabulary (用顏色或劃線標出重點 或生字 / 可以在文字內附上中文生字)
□	Useful information (請補充 主題相關的常識或知識 或新聞  不一定要有英文 但最好要有圖)
□ PPT (要有首頁及組員名字 / 多運用照片 / 字體顏色 及大小適中)
□ 3-5 Questions (請準備小獎勵 / 問題難易適中 / 有創意的問題 / 可運用照片)
□ Clips (短片長度請自行掌握 / 播放前請說明 )
□ Creativity (創意無敵 可以運用小表演 或是有獎猜謎 做開場 引起同學興趣 )

Midterm paper (個人) 說明:
□ 1 page “typed” outside reading (打字的課外英文閱讀文章一頁)  
□ hand-written notes (手寫的筆記及記號) 
□ Reflection個人心得 (in English)
□ 全部不要超過一張A4紙  (響應環保 請雙面印製 節省紙張資源)
